answerText: Love waves [or LQ waves][10] Love waves are surface waves with this property, which means particle motion is perpendicular to their direction of propagation. This type of wave is contrasted with a longitudinal wave.
heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2013 | 1 | 13 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: . Because the amplitude of these waves decreases with depth, they can be used to measure the thickness of the crust. For 10 points each: [10] Name these surface waves that are formed by SH waves propagating in a low-velocity layer overlaying a halfspace, off which they reflect at a postcritical angle.
